translation.en: While last month the dangerous attachment had the word 'invoice' in its title, this time it was labeled as 'Copy of corrected receipts for 11,2021...exe'," said Martin Jirkal of Eset.
translation.source: Zatímco minulý měsíc měla nebezpečná příloha v názvu slovo faktura, tentokrát byla označená jako Kopie oprav účtenky za 11,2021...exe," uvedl Martin Jirkal z Esetu.
translation.medium: "While last month's name contained a dangerous part in the word 'invoice', this time it was labeled as 'Copy of repair invoice for 11,2021...exe'," said Martin Jirkal from Eset.
translation.reference: While last month the dangerous attachment had the word 'invoice' in its title, this time it was labeled as 'Copy of corrected receipts for 11,2021...exe'," said Martin Jirkal of Eset.

translation.cs: Spyware obsahuje funkce, které skenují internetové prohlížeče a další programy, například e-mailové klienty Microsoft Outlook, Mozilla Thunderbird nebo Yandex.
translation.en: The spyware includes features that can scan web browsers and other programs, such as Microsoft Outlook, Mozilla Thunderbird, and Yandex.
translation.source: Spyware obsahuje funkce, které skenují internetové prohlížeče a další programy, například e-mailové klienty Microsoft Outlook, Mozilla Thunderbird nebo Yandex.
translation.medium: The spyware contains functions that scan internet browsers and other programs, such as Microsoft Outlook, Mozilla Thunderbird, or Yandex.
translation.reference: The spyware includes features that can scan web browsers and other programs, such as Microsoft Outlook, Mozilla Thunderbird, and Yandex.

translation.cs: Škodlivý kód aktivně vyhledává uložené přihlašovací údaje, které následně odesílá útočníkům.
translation.en: The malicious code actively searches for stored login details which it then sends to attackers.
translation.source: Škodlivý kód aktivně vyhledává uložené přihlašovací údaje, které následně odesílá útočníkům.
translation.medium: The malicious code actively searches for stored login credentials, which it then sends to attackers.
translation.reference: The malicious code actively searches for stored login details which it then sends to attackers.

translation.cs: Poslední silná kampaň proběhla v Česku na přelomu srpna a září a s blížícími se svátky a koncem roku aktivita útočníků opět roste.
translation.en: The last strong campaign took place at the turn of August and September in the Czech Republic , and with the holidays and the end of the year approaching, attacker activity is on the rise again.
translation.source: Poslední silná kampaň proběhla v Česku na přelomu srpna a září a s blížícími se svátky a koncem roku aktivita útočníků opět roste.
translation.medium: The last strong campaign took place in the Czech Republic at the end of August and beginning of September, with the approaching holidays and the end of the year, the activity of attackers is again on the rise.
translation.reference: The last strong campaign took place at the turn of August and September in the Czech Republic , and with the holidays and the end of the year approaching, attacker activity is on the rise again.

translation.cs: V listopadu zůstal aktivní i spyware Formbook.
translation.en: Formbook spyware also remained active in November.
translation.source: V listopadu zůstal aktivní i spyware Formbook.
translation.medium: In November, the spyware Formbook remained active.
translation.reference: Formbook spyware also remained active in November.

translation.cs: Na rozdíl od Agent Tesla se útočníci v tomto případě nezaměřují konkrétně na Českou republiku a bezpečnostní specialisté v listopadu zachytili spíše kampaně s globálním dosahem.
translation.en: Unlike Agent Tesla, the attackers in this case are not specifically targeting the Czech Republic and security specialists detected campaigns with a global reach in November.
translation.source: Na rozdíl od Agent Tesla se útočníci v tomto případě nezaměřují konkrétně na Českou republiku a bezpečnostní specialisté v listopadu zachytili spíše kampaně s globálním dosahem.
translation.medium: Unlike Agent Tesla, the attackers in this case do not focus specifically on the Czech Republic, and security specialists in November captured rather global campaigns.
translation.reference: Unlike Agent Tesla, the attackers in this case are not specifically targeting the Czech Republic and security specialists detected campaigns with a global reach in November.

translation.cs: V porovnání s říjnovými daty Formbook v listopadu mírně oslabil, nadále ale stojí za bezmála pětinou všech detekcí.
translation.en: Compared to the data from October, Formbook weakened slightly in November, but continues to account for nearly a fifth of all detections.
translation.source: V porovnání s říjnovými daty Formbook v listopadu mírně oslabil, nadále ale stojí za bezmála pětinou všech detekcí.
translation.medium: In comparison to the October data in Formbook in November, Formbook slightly weakened, but it is still standing for almost half of all detections.
translation.reference: Compared to the data from October, Formbook weakened slightly in November, but continues to account for nearly a fifth of all detections.

translation.cs: Útoky probíhaly kontinuálně po celý měsíc se zvýšenou aktivitou ve dnech 3., 10. a 15. listopadu.
translation.en: The attacks continued throughout the month with increased activity on November 3rd, 10th and 15th.
translation.source: Útoky probíhaly kontinuálně po celý měsíc se zvýšenou aktivitou ve dnech 3., 10. a 15. listopadu.
translation.medium: The attacks took place continuously throughout the month with increased activity on days 3, 10, and 15.
translation.reference: The attacks continued throughout the month with increased activity on November 3rd, 10th and 15th.

translation.cs: Formbook obsahoval nejčastěji přílohu s příponou .exe, která nesla název REQUEST FOR SPECIFICATION.
translation.en: The Formbook most often contained a .exe attachment, which was called REQUEST FOR SPECIFICATION.
translation.source: Formbook obsahoval nejčastěji přílohu s příponou .exe, která nesla název REQUEST FOR SPECIFICATION.
translation.medium: The formbook usually contained an attachment with the suffix ".exe", which carried the name REQUEST FOR SPECIFICATION.
translation.reference: The Formbook most often contained a .exe attachment, which was called REQUEST FOR SPECIFICATION.

translation.cs: Nadále se ale objevuje i název účtenka.
translation.en: However, the word 'receipt' continues to appear.
translation.source: Nadále se ale objevuje i název účtenka.
translation.medium: However, the term "invoice" continues to appear.
translation.reference: However, the word 'receipt' continues to appear.

translation.cs: Příloha v češtině může být pak pro českého uživatele daleko nebezpečnější.
translation.en: However, an attachment in Czech may be much more dangerous for a Czech user.
translation.source: Příloha v češtině může být pak pro českého uživatele daleko nebezpečnější.
translation.medium: An appendix in Czech can be much more dangerous for a Czech user.
translation.reference: However, an attachment in Czech may be much more dangerous for a Czech user.

translation.cs: Významný pokles a utlumení aktivity evidují bezpečnostní analytici u programu Fareit, který stál za 1,6 procenta útoků a v Čechách neměl několik posledních měsíců žádnou větší útočnou kampaň.
translation.en: Security analysts have recorded a significant decrease in Fareit, which was responsible for 1.6 percent of attacks and has not had any major attack campaigns in the Czech Republic in the last few months.
translation.source: Významný pokles a utlumení aktivity evidují bezpečnostní analytici u programu Fareit, který stál za 1,6 procenta útoků a v Čechách neměl několik posledních měsíců žádnou větší útočnou kampaň.
translation.medium: Security analysts have reported a significant drop and weakening of activity in the Fareit program, which accounted for 1.6% of attacks and had no major campaign in the last few months in the Czech Republic.
translation.reference: Security analysts have recorded a significant decrease in Fareit, which was responsible for 1.6 percent of attacks and has not had any major attack campaigns in the Czech Republic in the last few months.

translation.cs: Ta dnešní demoška chytráků, co nepotřebujou kyslík, protože kyslík je pro vakcinované blbce.
translation.en: Today’s demonstration of smart-asses who don't need oxygen because oxygen is for vaccinated morons.
translation.source: Ta dnešní demoška chytráků, co nepotřebujou kyslík, protože kyslík je pro vakcinované blbce.
translation.medium: The demoška chytráků today, who don't need oxygen because oxygen is for vaccinated mice.
translation.reference: Today’s demonstration of smart-asses who don't need oxygen because oxygen is for vaccinated morons.

translation.cs: Průvod Prahou byl větší, než média uvádějí.
translation.en: The parade through Prague was larger than the media reported.
translation.source: Průvod Prahou byl větší, než média uvádějí.
translation.medium: The guide through Prague was bigger than the media reports.
translation.reference: The parade through Prague was larger than the media reported.

translation.cs: Podle záběrů průvodu po nábřeží a podle mých zkušeností demonstranta se nebojím odhadu kolem 10 tisíc lidí.
translation.en: Based on the footage of the march along the waterfront and my experience as a protester, I don’t think there were fewer than 10,000 people.
translation.source: Podle záběrů průvodu po nábřeží a podle mých zkušeností demonstranta se nebojím odhadu kolem 10 tisíc lidí.
translation.medium: According to the shots of the procession along the embankment and according to my experience as a demonstrator, I estimate the number of people to be around 10,000.
translation.reference: Based on the footage of the march along the waterfront and my experience as a protester, I don’t think there were fewer than 10,000 people.

translation.cs: Lidé v průvodu naplnili nábřeží i most a protilehlou nábřežní komunikaci.
translation.en: People in the parade filled the waterfront and the bridge and the opposite waterfront road.
translation.source: Lidé v průvodu naplnili nábřeží i most a protilehlou nábřežní komunikaci.
translation.medium: People filled the quay and the bridge and the opposite quay.
translation.reference: People in the parade filled the waterfront and the bridge and the opposite waterfront road.

translation.cs: To je znamená, že lidí opravdu hodně.
translation.en: That is to say, a lot of people really.
translation.source: To je znamená, že lidí opravdu hodně.
translation.medium: It means that there are a lot of people.
translation.reference: That is to say, a lot of people really.

translation.cs: K průvodu asi čtyřtisícovky demonstrantů se spontánně přidává nevídané množství kolemjdoucích.
translation.en: An exceptional number of passers-by spontaneously joined the parade of about 4,000 demonstrators.
translation.source: K průvodu asi čtyřtisícovky demonstrantů se spontánně přidává nevídané množství kolemjdoucích.
translation.medium: To the march of around 4,000 demonstrators, spontaneously joins an unprecedented number of passersby.
translation.reference: An exceptional number of passers-by spontaneously joined the parade of about 4,000 demonstrators.

translation.cs: Tvrdím, že se tu rodí něco nového, píše Radek Mokrý.
translation.en: I claim that something new is being born here, writes Radek Mokrý.
translation.source: Tvrdím, že se tu rodí něco nového, píše Radek Mokrý.
translation.medium: I claim that something new is being born here, writes Radek Mokry.
translation.reference: I claim that something new is being born here, writes Radek Mokrý.

translation.cs: Že trvalá nespokojenost několika velkých skupin či vrstev obyvatelstva vedla k tomu, že našli společnou řeč.
translation.en: That the persistent dissatisfaction of several large groups and population subsets has brought them together to a mutual understanding.
translation.source: Že trvalá nespokojenost několika velkých skupin či vrstev obyvatelstva vedla k tomu, že našli společnou řeč.
translation.medium: The fact that the permanent dissatisfaction of several large groups or strata of the population led to the fact that they found a common language.
translation.reference: That the persistent dissatisfaction of several large groups and population subsets has brought them together to a mutual understanding.

translation.cs: Jen samotní antivaxeři, antirouškaři a spol. by takhle velký průvod nedokázali naplnit ani zaplatit.
translation.en: Anti-vaxxers, anti-maskers and others alone could not fill or pay for such a large parade.
translation.source: Jen samotní antivaxeři, antirouškaři a spol. by takhle velký průvod nedokázali naplnit ani zaplatit.
translation.medium: Only lone anti-vaxxers, anti-maskers, and co. were able to fill and pay for such a large parade.
translation.reference: Anti-vaxxers, anti-maskers and others alone could not fill or pay for such a large parade.

translation.cs: Akce spolku Chcípl pes mají vzestupnou popularitu, připomíná mi to Milión chvilek pro demokracii naruby.
translation.en: The events of the Chcípl pes association have been growing in popularity and remind me of the Milion chvilek pro demokracii association inside out.
translation.source: Akce spolku Chcípl pes mají vzestupnou popularitu, připomíná mi to Milión chvilek pro demokracii naruby.
translation.medium: The popularity of the Chcípl spolku's action is on the rise, reminding me of Million Moments for Democracy.
translation.reference: The events of the Chcípl pes association have been growing in popularity and remind me of the Milion chvilek pro demokracii association inside out.

translation.cs: Někdy mám takový dojem, že si pronajímají i stejné pódium a techniku.
translation.en: Sometimes I have the feeling that they rent the same stage and equipment.
translation.source: Někdy mám takový dojem, že si pronajímají i stejné pódium a techniku.
translation.medium: Sometimes I have the feeling that they are renting the same podium and technology.
translation.reference: Sometimes I have the feeling that they rent the same stage and equipment.

translation.cs: Těžko říct, jaké hnutí by se z téhle nespokojenosti dalo uplácat, záleží nejen na přísunu peněz, ale i na tom, zda se trojdávková vakcína od Pfizeru nestane čtver a více dávkovou.
translation.en: It's hard to say what kind of movement could be birthed out of this discontent; it depends not only on the money coming in, but also on whether Pfizer's three-dose vaccine becomes a quadruple-dose vaccine.
translation.source: Těžko říct, jaké hnutí by se z téhle nespokojenosti dalo uplácat, záleží nejen na přísunu peněz, ale i na tom, zda se trojdávková vakcína od Pfizeru nestane čtver a více dávkovou.
translation.medium: It's hard to say what kind of movement could arise from this dissatisfaction, it depends not only on the supply of money, but also on whether the three-dose vaccine from Pfizer becomes a four-dose or more vaccine.
translation.reference: It's hard to say what kind of movement could be birthed out of this discontent; it depends not only on the money coming in, but also on whether Pfizer's three-dose vaccine becomes a quadruple-dose vaccine.

translation.cs: Rozhodně to nebude hnutí levicové ani středové, to se vsaďte.
translation.en: It certainly won't be a left or center movement, you bet.
translation.source: Rozhodně to nebude hnutí levicové ani středové, to se vsaďte.
translation.medium: I'm sure it won't be a left-wing or centrist movement, that's for sure.
translation.reference: It certainly won't be a left or center movement, you bet.

translation.cs: Trojdávková vakcína se téměř zcela určitě stane vícedávkovou, protože je zjevné, že se budeme muset nechat přeočkovávat každého půl roku.
translation.en: The three-dose vaccine will almost certainly become a multi-dose vaccine, because it’s obvious that we’ll have to get re-vaccinated every six months.
translation.source: Trojdávková vakcína se téměř zcela určitě stane vícedávkovou, protože je zjevné, že se budeme muset nechat přeočkovávat každého půl roku.
translation.medium: The three-dose vaccine will almost certainly become a four-dose vaccine, because it is clear that we will need to get boosted every six months.
translation.reference: The three-dose vaccine will almost certainly become a multi-dose vaccine, because it’s obvious that we’ll have to get re-vaccinated every six months.

translation.cs: Jsem velmi rád, že nás vakcíny zachránily.
translation.en: I'm so glad the vaccines saved us.
translation.source: Jsem velmi rád, že nás vakcíny zachránily.
translation.medium: I am very glad that vaccines saved us.
translation.reference: I'm so glad the vaccines saved us.

translation.cs: Geniální akce vědců, na niž je lidstvo právem hrdo.
translation.en: An ingenious action by scientists that mankind is justly proud of.
translation.source: Geniální akce vědců, na niž je lidstvo právem hrdo.
translation.medium: Genius action of scientists, to which humanity is entitled.
translation.reference: An ingenious action by scientists that mankind is justly proud of.

translation.cs: Konec patu, Bulharsko má nového premiéra hlásajícího změnu
translation.en: End of stalemate, Bulgaria has a new prime minister advocating change
translation.source: Konec patu, Bulharsko má nového premiéra hlásajícího změnu
translation.medium: The end of the story, Bulgaria has a new prime minister announcing change.
translation.reference: End of stalemate, Bulgaria has a new prime minister advocating change

translation.cs: Bulharský prezident Rumen Radev pověřil sestavením nové vlády Kirila Petkova z protikorupčního hnutí Pokračujeme ve změně, které vyhrálo listopadové volby.
translation.en: Bulgarian President Rumen Radev has appointed Kiril Petkov of anti-corruption movement Continuing Change, which won the November elections, to form a new government.
translation.source: Bulharský prezident Rumen Radev pověřil sestavením nové vlády Kirila Petkova z protikorupčního hnutí Pokračujeme ve změně, které vyhrálo listopadové volby.
translation.medium: Bulgarian President Rumen Radev has tasked the formation of a new government with Kiril Petkov from the anti-corruption movement Continuing the change that won the November elections.
translation.reference: Bulgarian President Rumen Radev has appointed Kiril Petkov of anti-corruption movement Continuing Change, which won the November elections, to form a new government.

translation.cs: Tomu se už podařilo sestavit vládu široké koalice, která by se měla ujmout úřadu během pár dní.
translation.en: He has already succeeded in forming a broad coalition government that should take office in a couple of days.
translation.source: Tomu se už podařilo sestavit vládu široké koalice, která by se měla ujmout úřadu během pár dní.
translation.medium: Tom has already managed to form a government coalition that should take office within a few days.
translation.reference: He has already succeeded in forming a broad coalition government that should take office in a couple of days.

translation.cs: Politická krize v zemi trvá už od dubna, kdy minulá vláda pod tíhou protikorupčních protestů prohrála volby.
translation.en: The political crisis in the country has been ongoing since April, when the previous government lost the election after significant anti-corruption protests.
translation.source: Politická krize v zemi trvá už od dubna, kdy minulá vláda pod tíhou protikorupčních protestů prohrála volby.
translation.medium: The political crisis in the country has been ongoing since April, when the previous government lost the elections under the weight of anti-corruption protests.
translation.reference: The political crisis in the country has been ongoing since April, when the previous government lost the election after significant anti-corruption protests.

translation.cs: Vítězné strany hlásající boj proti úplatkářství a zneužívání moci se však nedokázaly domluvit, takže následovaly ještě dvoje předčasné volby.
translation.en: However, the winning parties in the fight against bribery and abuse of power could not reach an agreement, so two more early elections followed.
translation.source: Vítězné strany hlásající boj proti úplatkářství a zneužívání moci se však nedokázaly domluvit, takže následovaly ještě dvoje předčasné volby.
translation.medium: The winning parties proclaiming a fight against corruption and abuse of power were unable to agree, so there were two more early elections.
translation.reference: However, the winning parties in the fight against bribery and abuse of power could not reach an agreement, so two more early elections followed.

translation.cs: Co dělají kočky, když se nikdo nedívá?
translation.en: What do cats do when nobody is looking?
translation.source: Co dělají kočky, když se nikdo nedívá?
translation.medium: What do cats do when no one is watching?
translation.reference: What do cats do when nobody is looking?

translation.cs: Z „tajně“ pořízených záběrů je globální hit.
translation.en: The "secretly" taken footage is a global hit.
translation.source: Z „tajně“ pořízených záběrů je globální hit.
translation.medium: From secretly obtained footage, a global hit is born.
translation.reference: The "secretly" taken footage is a global hit.

translation.cs: V Británii o víkendu narůstaly obavy ohledně osudu 32leté Češky, po které už několik dní pátrá londýnská policie.
translation.en: Concerns increased in Britain over the weekend over the fate of a 32-year-old Czech woman who London police have been looking for for several days.
translation.source: V Británii o víkendu narůstaly obavy ohledně osudu 32leté Češky, po které už několik dní pátrá londýnská policie.
translation.medium: In Britain over the weekend, concerns grew about the fate of a 32-year-old Czech woman, after whom London police have been searching for several days.
translation.reference: Concerns increased in Britain over the weekend over the fate of a 32-year-old Czech woman who London police have been looking for for several days.

translation.cs: Petra Srncová byla naposledy spatřena před dvěma týdny, když jela z práce domů na jih britské metropole.
translation.en: Petra Srncová was last seen two weeks ago when she was travelling from work to her home in the south of the British capital.
translation.source: Petra Srncová byla naposledy spatřena před dvěma týdny, když jela z práce domů na jih britské metropole.
translation.medium: Petra Srncová was last seen two weeks ago when she was on her way home from work in the south of the British metropolis.
translation.reference: Petra Srncová was last seen two weeks ago when she was travelling from work to her home in the south of the British capital.

translation.cs: Po informacích o pracovnici dětské nemocnice volá kromě policie i její dosavadní zaměstnavatel či poslankyně zastupující část Londýna, kde bydlela.
translation.en: As well as the police, her employer and the MP representing the part of London where she lives are requesting information about the children's hospital employee.
translation.source: Po informacích o pracovnici dětské nemocnice volá kromě policie i její dosavadní zaměstnavatel či poslankyně zastupující část Londýna, kde bydlela.
translation.medium: In addition to the police, the employer of the children's hospital worker and the MP representing the part of London where she lived has also been contacted.
translation.reference: As well as the police, her employer and the MP representing the part of London where she lives are requesting information about the children's hospital employee.

translation.cs: „Zmizení Petry se vůbec nepodobá jejímu chování a začínáme o ni mít velké starosti,“ uvedla v sobotním videu Lucy O'Connorová z policejního oddělení ve čtvrti Lambeth, kde Srncová pracovala.
translation.en: "Petra's disappearance is completely out of character and we’re becoming very concerned about her," said Lucy O'Connor of the Police Department in Lambeth, where Srncova worked, in a video released on Saturday.
translation.source: „Zmizení Petry se vůbec nepodobá jejímu chování a začínáme o ni mít velké starosti,“ uvedla v sobotním videu Lucy O'Connorová z policejního oddělení ve čtvrti Lambeth, kde Srncová pracovala.
translation.medium: "The disappearance of Petra bears no resemblance to her behavior and we are starting to worry about her greatly," said Lucy O'Connor from the police department in the Lambeth district, where Srncová worked.
translation.reference: "Petra's disappearance is completely out of character and we’re becoming very concerned about her," said Lucy O'Connor of the Police Department in Lambeth, where Srncova worked, in a video released on Saturday.

translation.cs: „Její rodina v České republice o ni má taky velké obavy a zkrátka chce vědět, kde je,“ pokračovala.
translation.en: "Her family in the Czech Republic is really worried about her, too, and just wants to know where she is," she continued.
translation.source: „Její rodina v České republice o ni má taky velké obavy a zkrátka chce vědět, kde je,“ pokračovala.
translation.medium: "Her family in the Czech Republic is also very worried about her and they just want to know where she is," she continued.
translation.reference: "Her family in the Czech Republic is really worried about her, too, and just wants to know where she is," she continued.

translation.cs: Pohřešovaná Češka podle ní v neděli 28. listopadu okolo 19:45 odešla z práce a zamířila domů do čtvrti Camberwell.
translation.en: She said that the missing Czech woman left work on Sunday 28 November at around 7.45pm and was on her way home to the Camberwell area.
translation.source: Pohřešovaná Češka podle ní v neděli 28. listopadu okolo 19:45 odešla z práce a zamířila domů do čtvrti Camberwell.
translation.medium: A Czech woman who was dismissed from her job on Sunday, November 28th around 7:45 PM, left work and headed home to the Camberwell district.
translation.reference: She said that the missing Czech woman left work on Sunday 28 November at around 7.45pm and was on her way home to the Camberwell area.

translation.cs: Naposledy byla údajně spatřena v autobuse asi o půl hodiny později.
translation.en: She was allegedly last sighted on a bus about half an hour later.
translation.source: Naposledy byla údajně spatřena v autobuse asi o půl hodiny později.
translation.medium: She was supposedly seen for the last time in a bus about half an hour later.
translation.reference: She was allegedly last sighted on a bus about half an hour later.

translation.cs: Její zmizení nahlásil 3. prosince někdo z jejích spolupracovníků.
translation.en: She was reported missing on 3 December by one of her colleagues.
translation.source: Její zmizení nahlásil 3. prosince někdo z jejích spolupracovníků.
translation.medium: Her disappearance was reported by one of her colleagues on December 3rd.
translation.reference: She was reported missing on 3 December by one of her colleagues.

translation.cs: Srncová podle britských médií působila jako „asistentka zdravotních sester“ v dětské nemocnici Evelina London Children's Hospital, která patří pod nemocniční sdružení Guy's and St Thomas'.
translation.en: According to the British media, Srncová worked as a nursing assistant at the Evelina London Children's Hospital, which is a part of the Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust.
translation.source: Srncová podle britských médií působila jako „asistentka zdravotních sester“ v dětské nemocnici Evelina London Children's Hospital, která patří pod nemocniční sdružení Guy's and St Thomas'.
translation.medium: According to British media, Srncová worked as an "assistant to nursing sisters" in the Evelina London Children's Hospital, which belongs to the Guy's and St Thomas' Hospital Trust.
translation.reference: According to the British media, Srncová worked as a nursing assistant at the Evelina London Children's Hospital, which is a part of the Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust.

translation.cs: „Máme nesmírné obavy o naši drahou kolegyni Petru, která je nezvěstná,“ uvedla v twitterovém příspěvku skupina zdravotnických zařízení.
translation.en: "We are extremely concerned for our colleague Petra who is missing," the healthcare group said in a Twitter post.
translation.source: „Máme nesmírné obavy o naši drahou kolegyni Petru, která je nezvěstná,“ uvedla v twitterovém příspěvku skupina zdravotnických zařízení.
translation.medium: "We have immense concerns about our dear colleague Petra, who has been missing for a long time," tweeted a group of healthcare facilities.
translation.reference: "We are extremely concerned for our colleague Petra who is missing," the healthcare group said in a Twitter post.

translation.cs: „Chtěli bychom pobídnout kohokoli, kdo by mohl mít jakékoli informace, které by ji mohly pomoct najít, aby kontaktoval policii,“ pokračovalo sdělení.
translation.en: "We want to encourage anyone who might have any information that could help find her to contact the police," the statement continued.
translation.source: „Chtěli bychom pobídnout kohokoli, kdo by mohl mít jakékoli informace, které by ji mohly pomoct najít, aby kontaktoval policii,“ pokračovalo sdělení.
translation.medium: "We would like to appeal to anyone who may have any information that could help her find her way to contact the police," the statement continued.
translation.reference: "We want to encourage anyone who might have any information that could help find her to contact the police," the statement continued.

translation.cs: Šumperskou amatérskou malířku dětských pokojů Zdeňku Dvořákovou Kocourkovou (a také krajskou pirátskou radní) udal anonym, že svými výmalbami porušuje autorská práva.
translation.en: Zdeňka Dvořáková Kocourková, an amateur painter of children's rooms in Šumperk (and also a regional councilor for the Pirate Party), was condemned by an anonymous person for copyright violations with her paintings.
translation.source: Šumperskou amatérskou malířku dětských pokojů Zdeňku Dvořákovou Kocourkovou (a také krajskou pirátskou radní) udal anonym, že svými výmalbami porušuje autorská práva.
translation.medium: An anonymous person informed Šumperská amatérská malířka dětských pokojů Zdeňka Dvořáková Kocourková (and also the regional pirate councillor) that she was violating copyright laws with her paintings.
translation.reference: Zdeňka Dvořáková Kocourková, an amateur painter of children's rooms in Šumperk (and also a regional councilor for the Pirate Party), was condemned by an anonymous person for copyright violations with her paintings.

translation.cs: Soud ale uznal, že malby Krtečka v šumperských pokojících zákon neporušují.
translation.en: However, the court ruled that the paintings of Krtek the Mole in the rooms in Šumperk do not violate the law.
translation.source: Soud ale uznal, že malby Krtečka v šumperských pokojících zákon neporušují.
translation.medium: The court acknowledged that the Krtečka paintings in the Šumperk rooms do not violate the law.
translation.reference: However, the court ruled that the paintings of Krtek the Mole in the rooms in Šumperk do not violate the law.

translation.cs: V Ústí nad Labem zela měsíc díra v silnici v podobě kanálu bez poklopu.
translation.en: In Ústí nad Labem, a sewer without a manhole cover had been gaping for a month.
translation.source: V Ústí nad Labem zela měsíc díra v silnici v podobě kanálu bez poklopu.
translation.medium: In Ústí nad Labem, a hole drilled in the road in the form of a canal without a plug.
translation.reference: In Ústí nad Labem, a sewer without a manhole cover had been gaping for a month.

translation.cs: Šlo o život.
translation.en: It was a matter of life and death.
translation.source: Šlo o život.
translation.medium: It was about life.
translation.reference: It was a matter of life and death.

translation.cs: Magistrát odkazoval stížnosti na ŘSD, kterému silnice patří, a protože to prý nereagovalo, díra zela dál.
translation.en: The municipality referred the complaints to the Regional Road Directorate, which owns the road, and because it allegedly did not respond, the hole remained.
translation.source: Magistrát odkazoval stížnosti na ŘSD, kterému silnice patří, a protože to prý nereagovalo, díra zela dál.
translation.medium: The Magistrate referred complaints to the RSD, to which the road belongs, and because it allegedly did not react, the hole continued to grow.
translation.reference: The municipality referred the complaints to the Regional Road Directorate, which owns the road, and because it allegedly did not respond, the hole remained.

translation.cs: Nakonec si úřady vyjasnily zodpovědnosti a vlastnictví a po měsíci začalo ŘSD „situaci intenzivně řešit“.
translation.en: Eventually, the authorities clarified the responsibilities and ownership, and after a month, the Directorate began to "thoroughly resolve the situation.”
translation.source: Nakonec si úřady vyjasnily zodpovědnosti a vlastnictví a po měsíci začalo ŘSD „situaci intenzivně řešit“.
translation.medium: Finally, the authorities clarified responsibilities and ownership and after a month, the RSD began "intensively" resolving the situation.
translation.reference: Eventually, the authorities clarified the responsibilities and ownership, and after a month, the Directorate began to "thoroughly resolve the situation.”
